attributes.action: Change the law so that holders of blue disabled badges are not allowed to park on double yellow lines or in places causing an obstruction
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment, holders of disabled badges are allowed park on double yellow lines, and are not subject to the same parking laws as regular drivers.
This often leads to people abusing the scheme, and parking in places that inappropiate and quite often dangerous. 
This petition is to change the law so that blue badges are not allowed to park in a manner which is dangerous and causes a hazard to other road users.
